structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The urban-county government and the labor organization that has been designated as the exclusive representative of police officers, firefighter personnel, firefighters, or corrections personnel in an appropriate unit, through appropriate officials or their representatives, shall have the authority and the duty to bargain collectively.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 177, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 3, effective July 13, 2004.
